name: Dashbeam
description:
MAKE SURE TO SHARE YOUR HIGHSCORES IN THE COMMENTS!!!

--Instructions--

You are bouncing out of control, with only a death ray to assist you (which is also pretty dang out-of-control)
Use the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to fire it towards your mouse cursor. Your goal is to try and rack up as many points as humanly possible.

Be careful leaving it on too long, because you will run out of energy and be UNABLE to fire for a few seconds.

Aim your death ray at these:

DO NOT aim at these. They are more fragile, and if you break one, your run is over: 

To get some wacky abilities like rapid-fire rockets and target-bouncing lasers, pick up POWER-UPS (They will not hit the fake orbs):

  

--Points--

Points are calculated as follows (in this order):

1. The faster you smash an orb after it spawns, the more points you get.

2. Powerups continuously give you points.

3. Surviving the match until the end of the timer will double your points

4. There is a randomized threshold of total orb smashes, if you cross it, your number of smashes will be multiplied by 100 and added to your points.

--Extra--

Have tons of fun bouncing to dope music and blowing stuff up!

PRESS ESC to close the game window when eventually you get tired of the game. Crashing may happen, but is most often a minor issue. Just open the game back up.

WARNING: Some PC's might block the application due to its signature being unknown I guess, so if a Windows SmartScreen popup comes up, just press "more info" and allow the file to run.

*All non-music audio created by me within the time of the jam*
